00021 #include "../boost/xint/xint.hpp"

00023 namespace boost {
00024 namespace xint {
00025 namespace blockable {
00026 
00027 using namespace detail;
00028 
00034 std::string to_string(const integer& n, size_t base, bool uppercase) {
00035     try {
00036         return to_string(core::integer(n), base, uppercase);
00037     } catch (exception&) {
00038         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00039         else return std::string();
00040     }
00041 }
00042 
00044 integer from_string(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00045     try {
00046         if (str==detail::nan_text) return integer::nan();
00047         return integer(core::from_string(str, base));
00048     } catch (std::exception&) {
00049         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00050         else return integer::nan();
00051     }
00052 }
00053 
00055 integer from_binary(const std::string& str) {
00056     try {
00057         return integer(core::from_binary(str));
00058     } catch (exception&) {
00059         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00060         else return integer::nan();
00061     }
00062 }
00063 
00065 std::string to_binary(const integer& n) {
00066     try {
00067         return to_binary(core::integer(n));
00068     } catch (std::exception&) {
00069         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00070         else return std::string();
00071     }
00072 }
